ServerProperty.Description: Enable craft logging in inventory log (log_inventory must be enabled)
Base Value to use when auto-setting CON stat.
Set the Level of Debug for the Line of Sight (LoS) Manager (do not set level 3 in production), 0 = no debug, 1 = info, 2 = warn, 3 = debug.
Modify the final count of Aurulite Loot Generator drop. (TotalCount * lootgenerator_aurulite_amount_ratio)
Message to display to player if BG zones are closed
ServerProperty.DefaultValue: The battlegrounds are not open on this server.
ServerProperty.Value: The battlegrounds are not open on this server.

ServerProperty.Description: Health regen rate
Can the players teleport to battleground
A lost relic will automatically returns to its defined point, in seconds
Money Drop Modifier - Edit this to change the amount of money which is dropped e.g 1.5 is 50% more 2.0 is twice the amount (100%) 0.5 is half the amount (50%)
GameNPC's base HP * level
set to the email addresses you want logs automatically emailed to, multiple addresses seperate with ;
The Experience Points Rate Modifier - Edit this to change the rate at which you gain experience points e.g 1.5 is 50% more 2.0 is twice the amount (100%) 0.5 is half the amount (50%)
Timeout (in milliseconds) until Line of Sight (LoS) Manager tries to resend a LoS check, -1 to disable (don't get under 100ms except for Local Network).
days before your elligable for a free level, use -1 to deactivate
How many players are required on the relic pad to trigger the pillar?
Set to true if you wish to enable the new 1.110+ Tooltip Forced update each time the server send a skill to a new client.
Crafting Speed Modifier - Edit this to change the speed at which you craft e.g 1.5 is 50% faster 2.0 is twice as fast (100%) 0.5 is half the speed (50%)
Enable trade logging in inventory log (log_inventory must be enabled)
Should we perform LOS checks between controlled NPC's and players?
Task is also rewarded with ROG ?
Immunity Timer When player killed in PvP, in seconds
CSV Regions where player mount is allowed
Should players that exceed BG level cap be moved out of BG when logging in?
The Starting Mesage - Edit this to set what is displayed when a level 1 character enters the game for the first time, set to "" for nothing
ServerProperty.DefaultValue: Welcome for your first time to a Dawn of Light server, please edit this Starter Message
ServerProperty.Value: Welcome for your first time to a Dawn of Light server, please edit this Starter Message

ServerProperty.Description: The emote delay, default 3000ms before another emote.
Maximum number of bug reports allowed in queue. 0 to disabled max check
Use new passives realmabilities scaling (1.108+) ?
Change the chance to cast a spell for a mob or a pet
Should the server load buff tokens (npc and items), values True,False
The maximum keep level.
Players Needed For Claim - Edit this to change the amount of players required to claim a keep, towers are half this amount
Line of Sight (LoS) Manager will update LoS of Keep Guards in this range of the checker, raising this value will pack more Guards when Aggroing.
This value is % of total damages inflicted to level 1 door. (100=full damages)
The number of seconds from last kill the this lord is worth no RP.
Should we allow all realms access to DF
Enable other logging in inventory log (log_inventory must be enabled)
Allow any realm to craft items with 0 (no) realm.
Time player must wait after failed task check to get new chance for a task, in milliseconds
Username for serverlistupdate.
The RvR zones Experience Points Rate Modifier
Starting Money - Edit this to change the amount in copper of money new characters start the game with, max 214 plat
How fast should the Line of Sight (LoS) Manager clean up its data (in milliseconds), don't get under 30000 ms, raise cleanup count if you put high number here.
Train is custom pre-1.105 one ? (false set it to livelike 1.105+)
Number of seconds between allowed LOS checks for keep guards
Line of Sight (LoS) Manager will update LoS of Players in this range of the checker, should be disabled to prevent PvP abuses.
Line of Sight (LoS) Manager will update LoS of Player's Pet in this range of the checker, keep value low to prevent abuses.
set false if you don't want this
Number of times speed hack detected before banning. Multiples of 5 (20, 25, 30, etc)
Number of Entries cleaned from Line of Sight (LoS) Manager each Cleanup ticks, if you need to go above 10 000 entries consider using a shorter cleanup frequency.
Immunity Timer when player enters the game, in seconds
The Grace Period in minutes, to allow to relog near enemy structure after a link death.
Rent price for a cottage.
Mana regen rate

Crafting speed bonus in capital cities; 2 = 2x, 3 = 3x, ..., 1 = standard

Change the chance to fire a style for a mob or a pet
If true the market explorers are enabled and the cache is initialized on server start.

Shall we ignore too long outcoming packet ?

How much damage to increase per level

Serialized list of disabled expansions IDs, expansion IDs are client type seperated by ;

Increase count of Atlantean Glass Loot Generator drop for Named mobs. (count * lootgenerator_atlanteanglass_named_count)
Maximum XP a player can earn given in percent of their level. Default is 125%
Players Needed For Guild Form - Edit this to change the amount of players required to form a guild
Base Value to use when auto-setting qui stat.

Critical strike opening style effectiveness. Increase this to make CS styles BS, BSII and Perf Artery more effective

days before your elligable for a free level in Albion, use -1 to deactivate
How often (milliseconds) will players be checked for updates. Minimum allowed = 100 (100 milliseconds).

How often (milliseconds) should statistics be printed on the server console.
Integer multiplier used to increase/decrease RP worth based on upgrade level (0..10)

What is the maximum client type allowed to connect
Z distance tolerance before player is identified as a jump hacker?

This value is % of total damages inflicted to level 1 door. (100=full damages)
Set Timeout (in milliseconds) for PvP Line of Sight (LoS) Manager cache data, 0 to disable.
Max number of items allowed in a players garden.
How often, in milliseconds, to check follow distance. Lower numbers make NPC follow closer but increase load on server.
Starter Guild - Edit this to change the starter guild options, values True,False

Modifier used to adjust damage for pets classes.

Set the maximum number of objects allowed in a region. Smaller numbers offer better performance. This can't be changed while the server is running. (256 - 65535)
Perform a LOS check during a spell cast.

If true the housing consignment merchants use BP instead of money.
Base Value to use when auto-setting DEX stat.

Tune encounters taggued <Epic Encounter>. 0 means auto adaptative, others values are % of the initial difficulty (100%=initial difficulty)

Max length of stage 1 and 3, 1000 = 1 second

Base chance for dropping Aurulite using Loot Generator.

Disable to disallow players to connect with more than 1 account at a time.
